snippet.title: Thirsty Suitors Preview: A Refreshing Take on Messy Romance
snippet.description:
We took a first look at Thirsty Suitors, a compelling story-driven adventure with a vibrant art style and a self-aware sense of humor that reminds us a bit of both Yakuza and Scott Pilgrim.

#IGN #Gaming
